title: Quick Take: Trump And Sanders Win Indiana; Cruz Drops Out
description: Following a big loss in Indiana to Donald Trump, Ted Cruz announced he would suspend his presidential campaign. This episode, what's next in the race — and the latest delegate math for the Democrats following a win for Bernie Sanders in Indiana, with campaign reporter Scott Detrow, political editor Domenico Montanaro, and campaign reporter Asma Khalid. More coverage at nprpolitics.org. Email the show at nprpolitics@npr.org.
